title: Easy Pea Soup
directions: Place a saucepan over medium-low heat, and add oil and scallions. Stir until heated, then add frozen peas. Stir well with a wooden spoon.
Add 3 cups boiling water and stock concentrate to taste. Cover, and cook at a lively simmer until peas are tender, 5 to 10 minutes. Remove from heat, and allow to cool until no longer steaming.
Transfer soup to a blender. Add cheese, and pur√©e until mixture is very smooth. Serve immediately or, if desired, reheat to taste.
ingredients: Chicken or vegetable stock concentrate (powder, paste or cube)
